title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Competency Development for Teacher Design: Pre-Mathematics Teaching and Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate three or more instructional strategies using literature analysis techniques when designing mathematics teaching and learning
Learners can visualize relationships between core elements of mathematics lesson design using network analysis tools
Learners can select and apply five or more out of ten instructional design types to mathematics lessons
Learners can improve lesson designs at least twice based on feedback data collected in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
